tool_description: Online File Conversion Service for Office documents, PDFs, images, video, audio, and other file formats.
name: Conversion Tools
title: Conversion Tools

api_list.name: Upload file to convert
api_list.description: Uploading file to convert in the next API call

api_list.name: Convert file
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://conversion-tools.p.rapidapi.com/tasks"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "conversion-tools.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://conversion-tools.p.rapidapi.com/tasks"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "conversion-tools.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
